AlgorithmFactoryTemplate - Class in linefit.FitAlgorithms.Template
The *algorithm name* Factory class that is used to create the *algorithm name* Strategy so that it can be done in a generic way during run time, allowing the user to change the algorithm Feel free to explain high level aspects of your algorithm here
AlgorithmFactoryTemplate() - Constructor for class linefit.FitAlgorithms.Template.AlgorithmFactoryTemplate
The constructor that allows us to create the *name* Fit Data without knowing which factory it is and also determines whether or not its child can fix its slope or intercept
AlgorithmFactoryTemplate.AlgorithmStrategyTemplate - Class in linefit.FitAlgorithms.Template
The private class for the *algorithm name* Algorithm that does the calculations and that is made by the *algorithm name* Fit Algorithm
AlgorithmStrategyTemplate(DataSet) - Constructor for class linefit.FitAlgorithms.Template.AlgorithmFactoryTemplate.AlgorithmStrategyTemplate
